section.text: *NOTE: This section was added by temporary legislation that will expire on August 29, 2024.*
section.heading: Public awareness initiatives.

para.text: The Metropolitan Police Department shall prominently display information about extreme risk protection orders, including the petition process, on its website; and

The Office of the Attorney General shall develop and implement a public awareness campaign to inform residents, professionals, and District government employees about extreme risk protection orders, including the petition process.
